fields.name: Rules (Day, 1x, 70%):
fields.value: Choose 3 players and a technical, which they all must follow or be hit with an astral attack at the beginning of the night (the host may decide a technical is invalid)

fields.name: Unsigned Permission Slip (Day, 0x, 100%):
fields.value: Choose a player. You learn their role and then control their actions tonight.
